text: Jean Panisse (March 17, 1928 â€“ January 1, 2021) was a French actor. His career began in 1952 and he retired in 2004. Panisse was born in Marseille, France. He was known for his roles in An Angel on Wheels, The Young Wolves and Perched on a Tree. Panisse died on 1 January 2021 in Marseille from COVID-19 at the age of 92. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1928 births Category:2021 deaths Category:French movie actors Category:French stage actors Category:French television actors Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in France Category:Actors from Marseille
title: Jean Panisse
